title: Why is Grasp of the undying a completely different keystone than before?
body: My friend was literally baffled as to why they were generating so few stacks in an aram game with it, until I actually played with it myself and realized the absurdity that was going on. Why doesn't it activate when you auto-attack when you first enter combat? Being in combat for 4 entire seconds before you can get it off is SUCH a long time, especially when the new runes cut through you like butter. Why is it so unintuitive and horrible?
